detail_desc: Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
Kangol x H&M. Socks in a ribbed, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a high shaft.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats and elastication at the back. Side pockets and a sewn-in belt at the front with a covered metal buckle. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric and a pair of trousers in cotton twill. Top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Patterned swimsuit with a small stand-up collar, frill trim over the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and short legs. Zip with a zip guard at the back. UPF 50.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft, marled pointelle with overlocked edges. Top with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Rectangular sunglasses with pearly plastic frames and slim sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Trousers in softly draping twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and slim legs.
Short V-neck dress in jersey with a heavy drape. 3/4-length sleeves, concealed pockets in the side seams and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Set with a vest top and boxer shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Vest top with a picot trim around the neckline and armholes and a small bow at the front. Boxer shorts with a picot trim around the waist and hems, a small bow at the front and a lined gusset.
Short, gently tailored coat in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and no buttons. Lined.

Off-the-shoulder, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a frill and silicone trim at the top, and support panels and wide elastication in the sides. Concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Leggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and legs with decorative, quilted details.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Jacket in a herringbone weave made from a linen and cotton blend. Notch lapels, buttons at the front, a fake chest pocket and open front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined at the top.

Boiler suit in stretch cotton twill with a collar, zip down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Zipped chest pockets, side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Wide, gently tapered legs.

Trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut tops in cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline, a print motif and long sleeves.
Shirt in softly draping silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Short, V-neck dress in soft, airy viscose jersey with buttons down the front. Short sleeves and a gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.

Set with an Alice band and wand. Satin-covered, plastic Alice band with glittery mesh and a glittery appliqué in the shape of a witch’s hat with a fluffy spider on top. Plastic wand with a glittery cobweb and satin and mesh straps.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a knot detail at the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Coat in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels and no fasteners. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, discreet front pockets and a single back vent. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Top in jersey made from recycled polyester with a boat neck and short puff sleeves.
Fitted short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in soft cotton jersey with a trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
Leather ankle boots with pointed toes, a zip in one side and leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck and seam down the front and back. Lined at the top.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and pockets in the side seams. Short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, a pleat front and back for added width, and narrow ties under the bust. Unlined.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck T-shirts in stretch, cotton-blend jersey. Slim fit.
Hoop earrings in silver-plated and gold-plated metal with a pendant. Length 4 cm.
Jeggings in a washed, stretch cotton blend with concealed adjustable elastication at the waist, a fake fly, belt loops and fake front pockets.
Long-sleeved dress in a fine-knit cotton and wool blend with a hole pattern at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a lace trim at the hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Hat in felted wool with an imitation leather band that has a metal decoration. Width of brim 9 cm.
Twill jacket with sleeves and a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, press-studs down the front, an embroidered appliqué, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and ribbed cuffs.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and slim legs with creases and short slits at the hems.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Cropped top in a soft, fine knit with a wrapover front and long sleeves.

Jacket in washed denim with a hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, jersey-lined drawstring hood, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Ribbing at the cuffs, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. Unlined.
Relaxed-fit top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Headband in a soft knit with a decorative knot detail at the front. Width approx. 11 cm.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top, three inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Lined. Size 15x30x36 cm.
Long-sleeved playsuit in jersey crêpe with decorative buttons at the front and a sewn-in wrapover front that conceals the short legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Mules with wide, crossover straps with fringed edges. Jute-covered insoles with imitation leather reinforcement at the heels and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Jacket in soft, fast-drying thermal fleece with a high collar, concealed zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs. The longest chain has a pendant with a plastic stone. Adjustable length.
Sports trousers in fast-drying fabric with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams, tapered legs and reflective details.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a wide neckline and seam under the bust.
Alice bands decorated with a large grosgrain bow.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in cotton jersey. Printed top with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour seams.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Metal chain necklaces with pendants. Length 49 cm and 60 cm.
Lace bikini briefs with a mid waist with narrow straps, a lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, zipped side pockets, and ribbed hems.

Fleece-lined jacket in a nylon weave with a small print motif at the top, stand-up collar and detachable, jersey-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Longer and rounded at the back.
